text:
Hii everyone, new here!
I'm Sudiksha, currently preparing for GSoC 2026 . I would love to contribute to R Foundation projects.
Any advice on how to get started or how the workflow usually works would be appreciated.
Also is there any specific channel to ask doubts along the way?
Thanks!
